TopicTitle: Mouse & keyboard become non-responsive. Can't exit, have to CTRL-ALT-DEL the game

Articles.Content:
I've searched forums, but I'm not sure I've seen this issue.

Does anyone know why occasionally when loading into the Launch Pad from the VAB, the mouse & keyboard will become completely non-response for basic UI functions?

I can still click on Unity-specific things like MechJeb or the toolbar. But the Pause Menu doesn't come up, Staging (from SPACE) does nothing. Changing between Launch Pad & Space Center or Map, etc. does not resolve.

The only resolution I've found is to CTRL-ALT-DEL the game.

Help!

Edited October 14, 2017 by scottadges
Does it work to click Alt+F12 to open the debug menu? In that case, go to Input Locks -> Clear, that's a classic moce that will solve some stuff like this.
